amendment.description: Amendment sought to to reduce the appropriation for operating expenses of the Agency for International Development by $46.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 4 in the Congressional Record of May, 30, 1996 to reduce funds appropriated in the bill for the Agency for International Development by $46,554,000 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burton amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 233 (Roll no. 212).
